name: Dr. Sarah Collins
description: With over 15 years of experience, Dr. Collins has managed cases in neonatal care and developmental assessments for children. She has extensive experience working with childhood immunizations and preventive care.

name: Dr. Benjamin Tran
description: Dr. Tran has 12 years of experience focusing on child nutrition and behavioral health. His approach combines family-centered practices with preventive care for young children.

name: Dr. Lisa Rodriguez
description: Known for her expertise in managing respiratory issues in children, Dr. Rodriguez has over 18 years of experience. She has also led several child health initiatives in local communities.

name: Dr. Raj Patel
description: Dr. Patel specializes in treating infectious diseases in children. With 14 years in the field, he is skilled in handling complex cases involving immunodeficiency disorders.

name: Dr. Emily Zhao
description: A compassionate pediatrician with 10 years of experience, Dr. Zhao focuses on child development milestones and cognitive health. She is known for her gentle approach with young patients.

name: Dr. Michael Chen
description: With over 25 years of experience, Dr. Chen has vast knowledge in pediatric emergency care and is highly skilled in handling acute and chronic illnesses in children.

name: Dr. Priya Nair
description: Dr. Nair has 13 years of experience focusing on adolescent health and mental well-being. She advocates for preventive care and lifestyle changes to promote long-term health in children.

name: Dr. John Kim
description: An expert in pediatric dermatology, Dr. Kim has 17 years of experience treating common skin conditions in children. His calm and patient demeanor makes him popular among young patients.

name: Dr. Aisha Malik
description: Dr. Malik has a decade of experience specializing in nutrition and preventive care. Sheâ€™s known for her interactive educational sessions with families on healthy eating habits for kids.

name: Dr. Kevin Gomez
description: Dr. Gomez brings 20 years of experience in pediatric cardiology. He has a strong track record of managing congenital heart conditions and is highly regarded for his precise diagnostic skills.
